Text: Utena:  Utena is one of the oldest settlements of Lithuania.
Triplets:<Utena
3:

Text: Utena:  The name of the city is most probably derived from a hydronym.
Triplets:<Utena
4:

Text: Utena:  The name of the settlement has been known since 1261.
